name: Map Hopper
description:
A 2D, Multiple-Level Puzzle Game where your goal in each level is to lead the fox to her favorite type of berries - berries. Oh I forgot to mention that you can't control the fox nor the berries, really.
So how will you lead the fox to her snack? 
Play to find out :)

Was made by a solo-developer during the 48-hour GMTK 2020 Game Jam, where the theme was "Out of Control".

Feel free to leave feedback on the game and if you can, I'd really appreciate a vote if you're playing the game during the GMTK 2020 Game Jam :)

Have Fun!
